snippet: A mayoral candidate in Clarksdale was beaten and burned before his body was found by a river levee last week, his family said Sunday.
abstract: Family of Clarksdale, Mississippi, mayoral candidate Marco McMillian say he was beaten and burned before his body was found by a river levee; authorities have charged Lawrence Reed with murder.
lead_paragraph: A mayoral candidate in Clarksdale was beaten and burned before his body was found by a river levee last week, his family said Sunday.

headline.seo: Mississippi: Candidate Beaten and Burned, Family Says
headline.main: Mississippi: Candidate Beaten and Burned, Family Says
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Candidate Beaten and Burned, Family Says
